<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[All in my Head](/Feats.aspx?ID=1660) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You would take damage from a Strike or spell that doesn't have the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) trait or otherwise cause instant death (such as [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76)).

</column>

---

Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination. The damage changes from its usual damage type to mental damage, and the damaging effect gains the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait. You can't use this reaction if you are immune to [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects or mental damage.
name: All in my Head
